name: Pillaat_and_Nerro
content: Pillaat and Nerro was a Troig male bartender who worked in the Spyder, a gambling establishment located on the planet Coruscant. During the Galactic Civil War, Pillaat and Nerro encountered a band of Pyke Syndicate operatives who had ventured to the Spyder while searching for the Nikto bounty hunter Kaa'to Leeachos.
